Generation VIII.Sword: It's usually peaceful, but the vandalism of mines enrages it. Offenders will be incinerated with flames that reach 2,700 degrees Fahrenheit .
Generation VIII.Shield: While it's engaged in battle, its mountain of coal will burn bright red, sending off sparks that scorch the surrounding area.

Generation IX.Scarlet: To intimidate its opponents, Coalossal will vigorously shake its body, scattering coal from its smoldering back.
Generation IX.Violet: It's gentle usually but fearsome when angered. With a body that burns at over 2,700 degrees Fahrenheit , it crushes foes and turns them to ash.
